text: Ordered salmon curry rice. Curry not as flavourful as those in restaurants, but good enough. And nutritious - big pieces of carrots and potatoes. Overall, a satisfying bowl of Japanese curry rice.
The eggs are basically non existent. Not fluffy at all. Very different from the photos shown in the menu. Wonâ€™t visit this place again.
Very big portion of bento for the price, value for money!
The bibimbap taste bad. No sesame oil. Not sure if they even use gochujang. Worse. They mixed kimchi into the bibimbap. Kimchi is supposed to be a banchan not inside the rice. Omg. Please improve.

alamak, japanese & korean food now become china food,
